note: GDP data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Share of primary energy that is low-carbon vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Low-carbon energy is the sum of nuclear and renewable sources, and is measured as a percentage of [primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy) consumption using the [substitution method](#dod:substitutionmethod). Gross domestic product (GDP) per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
